titles: A dissertation concerning the government of the ancient church by bishops, metropolitans, and patriarchs more particularly concerning the ancient power and jurisdiction of the bishops of Rome and the encroachments of that upon other sees, especially the See of Constantinople / by William Cave ...
author: Cave, William, 1637-1713.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church polity --  History --  Early church, ca. 30-600.
